answers.answer: I failed my 1 hour test and had to do the 3hour one today! I will get my results back tomorrow though! Praying I don't have gestational diabetes!

Me too. I failed the 1 hr and passed the 3 hr. I'm hoping with this pregnancy to pass right away the 1 hr one cuz the 3 hr was awful in my opinion. I dont care about being poked by needles I could handle that... I hated that nasty drink.
I am scheduled for my 3hour test next week. Fingers crossed it goes well!!!!Good to know there are others that were good the second time around :)

I had to do the 3 hour test today. It wasn't so bad.  I don't like the drink either but got it all down.  Lol  with the one hour I was shaky after and the 3 hour one I did with my son I was really shaky after.  This time I wasn't at all. Thank goodness! Hoping for a good report tomorrow!

question: Have anyone fail the one hour test and pass the three hour test?
title: glucose tolerance test
